The "Best Buddies-Qatar Sports Commentator Contest"
20  May,  2024
In partnership with Best Buddies – Qatar and Ahmed Bin Mohammed Al Thani Secondary School for Boys
,
to organize the competition (Sports Commentator
/
Best Buddies
),
which is concerned with integrating people with disabilities and their partners
,
to encourage them to practice
social activities and enhance effective communication among them
,
as one team in society
,
where six schools participated and highlighted the abilities of the affiliates and their friends in sports commentary.
